attributes.action: People that are charged with murder of children get whole life orders.
attributes.additional_details: The government are the only ones who can save are children. We need to pass a level that is for the children and safeguards them better. There needs to be justice for all of the children that have had there lives taken away by the people that were suppose to love them.
attributes.background: I would like to see people that are charged with the murder of Children get whole life orders. In this country this Keeps happening and the blame is being passed around. These children had there whole lives infront of them and it has been taken away snd there has to be justice and a deterrent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602482
